verses.verse: זְב֣וּבֵי <S%H2070><s%> ze-Vu-vei flies מָ֔וֶת <S%H4194><s%> Ma-vet, Dead יַבְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H887><s%> yav-'Ish a stinking savour יַבִּ֖יעַ <S%H5042><s%> yab-Bi-a' to send forth שֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> She-men cause the ointment רוֹקֵ֑חַ <S%H7543><s%> ro-Ke-ach; of the apothecary יָקָ֛ר <S%H3368><s%> ya-Kar him that is in reputation מֵחָכְמָ֥ה <S%H2451><s%> me-cha-che-Mah for wisdom מִכָּב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> mik-ka-Vod [and] honour סִכְל֥וּת <S%H5531><s%> sich-Lut folly מְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> me-'At. [so doth] a little

לֵ֤ב <S%H3820><s%> lev heart חָכָם֙ <S%H2450><s%> cha-Cham A wise man's לִֽימִינ֔וֹ <S%H3225><s%> li-mi-No, [is] at his right hand וְלֵ֥ב <S%H3820><s%> ve-Lev heart כְּסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> ke-Sil but a fool's לִשְׂמֹאלֽוֹ׃ <S%H8040><s%> lis-mo-Lo. at his left

וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- Even בַּדֶּ֛רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> bad-De-rech by the way; כְּשֶׁהַסָּכָל ke-she-has-sa-chal ככְּשֶׁסָּכָ֥ל <S%H5530><s%> ke-shes-sa-Chal the fool קהֹלֵ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> ho-Lech walketh לִבּ֣וֹ <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bo his wisdom חָסֵ֑ר <S%H2638><s%> cha-Ser; faileth וְאָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> ve-'a-Mar [him] and he saith לַכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> lak-Kol to everyone סָכָ֥ל <S%H5530><s%> sa-Chal Yea also when he that is a fool הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If ר֤וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach If the spirit הַמּוֹשֵׁל֙ <S%H4910><s%> ham-mo-Shel of the ruler תַּעֲלֶ֣ה <S%H5927><s%> ta-'a-Leh rise up עָלֶ֔יךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-cha, against מְקוֹמְךָ֖ <S%H4725><s%> me-kom-Cha not thy place אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay תַּנַּ֑ח <S%H3240><s%> tan-Nach; against thee leave כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because מַרְפֵּ֔א <S%H4832><s%> mar-Pe, for yielding יַנִּ֖יחַ <S%H3240><s%> yan-Ni-ach pacifieth חֲטָאִ֥ים <S%H2399><s%> cha-ta-'Im offences גְּדוֹלִֽים׃ <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lim. great

יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> yesh There is רָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah, an evil רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti [which] I have seen תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> Ta-chat under הַשָּׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> hash-Sha-mesh; under the sun כִּשְׁגָגָ֕ה <S%H7684><s%> kish-ga-Gah as an error שֶׁיֹּצָ֖א <S%H3318><s%> shei-yo-Tza [which] proceedeth מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei from הַשַּׁלִּֽיט׃ <S%H7989><s%> hash-shal-Lit. the ruler

נִתַּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> nit-Tan is set הַסֶּ֔כֶל <S%H5529><s%> has-Se-chel, Folly בַּמְּרוֹמִ֖ים <S%H4791><s%> bam-me-ro-Mim dignity רַבִּ֑ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim; in great וַעֲשִׁירִ֖ים <S%H6223><s%> va-'a-shi-Rim and the rich בַּשֵּׁ֥פֶל <S%H8216><s%> bash-She-fel in low place יֵשֵֽׁבוּ׃ <S%H3427><s%> ye-She-vu. sit

רָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti I have seen עֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim servants עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on סוּסִ֑ים <S%H5483><s%> su-Sim; upon horses וְשָׂרִ֛ים <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rim and princes הֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> ho-le-Chim walking כַּעֲבָדִ֖ים <S%H5650><s%> ka-'a-va-Dim as servants עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. upon the earth

חֹפֵ֥ר <S%H2658><s%> cho-Fer He that diggeth גּוּמָּ֖ץ <S%H1475><s%> gum-Matz a pit בּ֣וֹ bo יִפּ֑וֹל <S%H5307><s%> yip-Pol; shall fall וּפֹרֵ֥ץ <S%H6555><s%> u-fo-Retz into it and whoso breaketh גָּדֵ֖ר <S%H1447><s%> ga-Der an hedge יִשְּׁכֶ֥נּוּ <S%H5391><s%> yish-she-Chen-nu shall bite נָחָֽשׁ׃ <S%H5175><s%> na-Chash. a serpent

מַסִּ֣יעַ <S%H5265><s%> mas-Si-a' Whoso removeth אֲבָנִ֔ים <S%H68><s%> 'a-va-Nim, stones יֵעָצֵ֖ב <S%H6087><s%> ye-'a-Tzev shall be hurt בָּהֶ֑ם ba-Hem; בּוֹקֵ֥עַ <S%H1234><s%> bo-Ke-a' therewith [and] he that cleaveth עֵצִ֖ים <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim wood יִסָּ֥כֶן <S%H5533><s%> yis-Sa-chen shall be endangered בָּֽם׃ Bam.

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If קֵהָ֣ה <S%H6949><s%> ke-Hah be blunt הַבַּרְזֶ֗ל <S%H1270><s%> hab-bar-Zel, If the iron וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not פָנִ֣ים <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nim the edge קִלְקַ֔ל <S%H7043><s%> kil-Kal, and he do not whet וַחֲיָלִ֖ים <S%H2428><s%> va-cha-ya-Lim to more strength יְגַבֵּ֑ר <S%H1396><s%> ye-gab-Ber; then must he put וְיִתְר֥וֹן <S%H3504><s%> ve-yit-Ron [is] profitable הַכְשֵׁ֖יר <S%H3787><s%> hach-Sheir to direct חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> choch-mah but wisdom

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- If יִשֹּׁ֥ךְ <S%H5391><s%> yish-Shoch will bite הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <S%H5175><s%> han-na-Chash Surely the serpent בְּלוֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> be-lo- being לָ֑חַשׁ <S%H3908><s%> La-chash; without enchantment וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein there יִתְר֔וֹן <S%H3504><s%> yit-Ron, is no better לְבַ֖עַל <S%H1167><s%> le-Va-'al archer הַלָּשֽׁוֹן׃ <S%H3956><s%> hal-la-Shon. babbler

דִּבְרֵ֥י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei The words פִי־ <S%H6310><s%> fi- mouth חָכָ֖ם <S%H2450><s%> cha-Cham of a wise man's חֵ֑ן <S%H2580><s%> Chen; [are] gracious וְשִׂפְת֥וֹת <S%H8193><s%> ve-sif-Tot but the lips כְּסִ֖יל <S%H3684><s%> ke-Sil of a fool תְּבַלְּעֶֽנּוּ׃ <S%H1104><s%> te-val-le-'En-nu. will swallow up

תְּחִלַּ֥ת <S%H8462><s%> te-chil-Lat The beginning דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> div-rei- of the words פִ֖יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> Fi-hu of his mouth סִכְל֑וּת <S%H5531><s%> sich-Lut; [is] foolishness וְאַחֲרִ֣ית <S%H319><s%> ve-'a-cha-Rit and the end פִּ֔יהוּ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-hu, of his talk הוֹלֵל֖וּת <S%H1948><s%> ho-le-Lut madness רָעָֽה׃ <S%H7451><s%> ra-'Ah. [is] mischievous

וְהַסָּכָ֖ל <S%H5530><s%> ve-has-sa-Chal A fool יַרְבֶּ֣ה <S%H7235><s%> yar-Beh also is full דְבָרִ֑ים <S%H1697><s%> de-va-Rim; of words לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- No יֵדַ֤ע <S%H3045><s%> ye-Da' cannot tell הָאָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> ha-'a-Dam a man מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- what שֶׁיִּֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> shei-yih-Yeh, will happen וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> va-'a-Sher what יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yeh will come מֵֽאַחֲרָ֔יו <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rav, what shall be and what shall be after מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> mi and who יַגִּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> yag-Gid him who can tell לֽוֹ׃ lo.

עֲמַ֥ל <S%H5999><s%> 'a-Mal The labour הַכְּסִילִ֖ים <S%H3684><s%> hak-ke-si-Lim of the foolish תְּיַגְּעֶ֑נּוּ <S%H3021><s%> te-yag-ge-'En-nu; wearieth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָדַ֖ע <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da' every one of them because he knoweth לָלֶ֥כֶת <S%H1980><s%> la-Le-chet to go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עִֽיר׃ <S%H5892><s%> 'Ir. to the city

אִֽי־ <S%H337><s%> 'i- Woe לָ֣ךְ lach אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, to thee O land שֶׁמַּלְכֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4428><s%> shem-mal-Kech when thy king נָ֑עַר <S%H5288><s%> Na-'ar; [is] a child וְשָׂרַ֖יִךְ <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Ra-yich and thy princes בַּבֹּ֥קֶר <S%H1242><s%> bab-Bo-ker in the morning יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <S%H398><s%> yo-Che-lu. eat

אַשְׁרֵ֣יךְ <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Reich Blessed אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, [art] thou O land שֶׁמַּלְכֵּ֖ךְ <S%H4428><s%> shem-mal-Kech when thy king בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- [is] the son חוֹרִ֑ים <S%H2715><s%> cho-Rim; of nobles וְשָׂרַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Ra-yich and thy princes בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> ba-'Et in due season יֹאכֵ֔לוּ <S%H398><s%> yo-Che-lu, eat בִּגְבוּרָ֖ה <S%H1369><s%> big-vu-Rah for strength וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo for בַשְּׁתִֽי׃ <S%H8358><s%> vash-she-Ti. and not for drunkenness

בַּעֲצַלְתַּ֖יִם <S%H6103><s%> ba-'a-tzal-Ta-yim By much slothfulness יִמַּ֣ךְ <S%H4355><s%> yim-Mach decayeth הַמְּקָרֶ֑ה <S%H4746><s%> ham-me-ka-Reh; the building וּבְשִׁפְל֥וּת <S%H8220><s%> u-ve-shif-Lut and through idleness יָדַ֖יִם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Da-yim of the hands יִדְלֹ֥ף <S%H1811><s%> yid-Lof droppeth through הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. the house

לִשְׂחוֹק֙ <S%H7814><s%> lis-chOk for laughter עֹשִׂ֣ים <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim is made לֶ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> Le-chem, A feast וְיַ֖יִן <S%H3196><s%> ve-Ya-yin and wine יְשַׂמַּ֣ח <S%H8055><s%> ye-sam-Mach makes חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim; age וְהַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> ve-hak-Ke-sef but money יַעֲנֶ֥ה <S%H6030><s%> ya-'a-Neh answereth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֹּֽל׃ <S%H3605><s%> hak-Kol. to everything

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> gam Furthermore בְּמַדָּֽעֲךָ֗ <S%H4093><s%> be-mad-da-'a-Cha, no not in thy thought מֶ֚לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech not the king אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תְּקַלֵּ֔ל <S%H7043><s%> te-kal-Lel, Curse וּבְחַדְרֵי֙ <S%H2315><s%> u-ve-chad-Rei rooms מִשְׁכָּ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H4904><s%> mish-Ka-ve-cha, your sleeping אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תְּקַלֵּ֖ל <S%H7043><s%> te-kal-Lel and curse עָשִׁ֑יר <S%H6223><s%> 'a-Shir; not the rich כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ע֤וֹף <S%H5775><s%> of for a bird הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim of the air יוֹלִ֣יךְ <S%H1980><s%> yo-Lich will carry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַקּ֔וֹל <S%H6963><s%> hak-Kol, the voice וּבַ֥עַל <S%H1167><s%> u-Va-'al and that which hath; הַכְּנָפַיִם hak-ke-na-fa-yim ככְּנָפַ֖יִם <S%H3671><s%> ke-na-Fa-yim bird קיַגֵּ֥יד <S%H5046><s%> yag-Geid shall tell דָּבָֽר׃ <S%H1697><s%> da-Var. the matter
